sentences.english: The ancient glacial remains in Taibaishan was glacial relief area, which was remained very well in the East of China.
sentences.chinese: 太白山是我国东部古冰川地貌保存较好的山地。

sentences.english: While in Taibai Mountain, will feel like the body into an ink painting.
sentences.chinese: 而身临太白山，会觉得仿似身入一幅水墨大画之中。

sentences.english: Taibai Mountain is a famous place of interest in Shaanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 太白山是陕西著名的森林游览胜地。
